TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ValidatedControlConverter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlIDConverter

summary.span: 将可验证的 Web 窗体页上与验证控件的控件转换为包含控件的 ID 的字符串

span.span: Converts a control on the Web Forms page that can be validated with a validation control to a string containing the control's ID.

returns.span: 如果应将控件添加到可以进行验证，则控件的列表否则为。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当方法将返回`true`，则实例将添加到控件参数中指定的控件的 ID返回方法。When the method returns `true`, the instance will add the ID of the control specified in the control parameter to the returned by the method.
